title: RBI Ready With Unified Market Interface: Governor
description: Malhotra also flagged the issue of growing digital fraud and made a strong case for making efforts to curb the menace. The RBI Governor further stated that artificial intelligence (AI) holds the potential to fundamentally enhance the next generation of Digital Public Infrastructure (DPI).

title: Tech Stocks Boosted by AI Optimism Amid Economic Uncertainties
description: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq experienced gains amid fluctuating economic conditions and the specter of a U.S. government shutdown. Tech stocks, buoyed by artificial intelligence optimism, helped offset concerns. Gold's surge highlighted economic apprehensions, while potential Federal Reserve actions were watched closely as data releases were delayed.
content:
The S&P 500 and Nasdaq edged higher on Wednesday, continuing a volatile rally as investors awaited new insights into interest-rate trends.
The delay in key economic reports due to the U.S. government shutdown has traders focusing on Federal Reserve o... [584 chars]
